info.name: school-management-system-api
info.description: ### This collection contains all the essential routes for managing users, schools, classrooms, and students. Each API request includes the necessary HTTP methods, expected request bodies, and sample responses.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Green Valley High School",
    "address": "123 Green Valley Rd",
    "phoneNumber": "+1 234 567 890",
    "email": "greenvalley@example.com",
    "website": "http://greenvalley.edu"
}

response.name: success
